item.title: Smoking cannabis with tobacco may disrupt the brain’s “bliss molecule”

item.title: Extreme floods are slashing global rice yields faster than expected

item.title: 55-million-year-old fossils reveal bizarre crocs that dropped from trees

item.title: Scientists melt early protein clumps and shut down Alzheimer’s damage
item.description: Researchers found that tau proteins don’t jump straight into forming Alzheimer’s-associated fibrils—first they assemble into soft, reversible clusters...
